name: Home Team Consulting
description:
Terry grew up in the Mid-West and has made his home in central Iowa. He holds a degree in Business Administration and has spent over 20 years focused on business leadership and information technology. He is well-adept at identifying and executing change in small to mid-market organizations. He started his professional career as a pc support technician and rose to that of a Vice President of a multi-million dollar national healthcare company.
He enjoys working with others, developing them, helping them identify and reach their potential.
Terry has been working nearly exclusively with salesforce.com for over 5 years. His skill set includes both administrative expertise as well as custom development abilities. He has worked extensively with both the Salesforce Sales and Service Clouds and is able to help you accomplish your goals.
Our projects have come in all sizes and scopes. Some projects are purely administrative where Terry will configure the system to best support your business processes. Some projects involve the creation of custom objects or analytics. Others may involve the creation of custom code, custom screens or the implementation of AppExchange products.
